name: GNU dot org - dark
description: This is a rough, dark version of the GNU dot org website, really handy for all of their white info pages. I might develop this some more.
additional_info:
Version 0.2 puts the dark background on the whole page instead of just the body, darkens the
navigation font colors on the lavender background at the top of the info pages, and gives this
navigation area a little padding with pretty, cute rounded corners. It also replaces Arial and
Helvetica with fonts that actually put serifs on their capital I's. I usually prefer Tahoma,
but I went with Verdana because Tahoma is a little too skinny on these pages.
